name: Gd Ford
text: I had been a smoker for 40 plus years. I smoked a pack a day and tried to quit numerous times. The hazzle of not being able to walk to my mailbox without getting out of breath is now a thing in my past. I am now able to walk to my mailbox without loosing my breath. Not only am I now a non smoker but I have even been sleeping better. Thanks to Robertsdale Hypnosis for making me a nonsmoker!

name: Reunion Pointe
text: Diets? I have been on all of them.   Even though I never gave up hope of better health and more beautiful shape, I was totally blown away by how hypnosis helped me achieve results with absolutely no diet at all.   I thought I was happy this morning when I put on jeans I hadn’t been able to wear for years but happier when the shorts I wore yesterday came off without unbuttoning or unzipping them.   My husband commented the shorts need to hit the donation bag! This is a journey and I still have a ways to go.   I see the road ahead as an easy one to navigate.

name: Annette Nolan
text:
When I started this weight loss program I was 156 pounds and a size 12.  8 sessions later, I am 146 pounds and a very comfortable size 10!  With 13 inches GONE!

And the best part is I’ve been able to maintain that loss (and add to it) over time... even over Thanksgiving. No more YO-YO dieting for me! Hypnosis works so much better than any diet.

It isn’t magic but the audio tapes I use in my program make me feel more alive... more confident. Even 2 weeks after listening to them I felt like I came out from under a rock - I was more aware and hopeful for my ultimate success - which is a size 8. I have only 15 more pounds to go and I’m very sure I’ll reach that goal in the next 3 months, then I’m set!!! I can’t wait.

I’m surprised at how much more energy I have, I’m sleeping better and my stress level is much better.

In truth, Not all hypnotists are created equally. I did see a hypnotist a few times 25 years ago... but he was not nearly as professional and didn’t give me anywhere near the support, information or products that I have here. Robertsdale Hypnosis even has a service guarantee. As long as I was accepted into a program, they will stick with me until I get my goal weight as long as I follow instructions! Can’t beat that.

I’ve decided to be on one of their ads as soon as I lose the rest of the weight! Look for me there!!

name: minoley1
text:
I just finished my first hypnosis session to stop smoking and WOW!!!!  My stress level was about a 10 before I came to Robertsdale Hipnosis. After just one session it is truly zero. My mind is so relaxed, it almost seems like my problems are only half as bad, and I truly do not want a cigarette. I'M DONE!

I admit Iwas a little doubtful if this would work at first.  More than anything I just wanted to feel like I didn't want a cigarette anymore. And it's weird! I really feel that way now! I am so glad I made myself call for my free screening. This is so worth it. Try it! it might change your life. It did for mine.

name: Tasha Johnson
text: I had never done anything like this before but after one session I actually quit smoking! I smoked a pack, sometimes more a day for 11 years! I have tried everything to quit, patches, lozenges, all of it!  Absolutely the best experience and best decision I ever made. I feel 10x better and healthier. The hypnosis has helped me with my confidence and anxiety also. If your on the fence and not sure if it something you want to do, do it! Julie is wonderful!

name: Crystal Moye
text:
The thing I wanted to know the most when I came here was how it worked for people. I was done with diets that don't work and I really wanted to learn to eat like a thin person.

Besides learning that, I also found out how to get rid of stress and calm down in my head.
I was surprised how much my sleep improved from the first day which makes my life a whole lot calmer.  My husband has noticed I'm more relaxed and active and he's happy with the results so far.

What's really cool is already I'm only eating HALF of what I used to, and it's not because
I "have to" it's because I WANT to and that is a huge change.

My advice to someone looking at coming here is there are so many benefits and things you learn about yourself when you come here, you shouldn't miss it!

name: Chris Roberson
text: I gotta tell the truth..  I am the most skeptical  person you will ever meet.  I was really doubtful  about hypnosis  and whether or not it really worked  It kinda seemed  like it was just gimmicky.  However I smoked all the way up until my appointment  time at 3PM.  When my first session  was complete I walked out and had zero, I mean zero desire for a cigarette!  I haven't smoked in 3 weeks now and have no desire to.  I am a believer!  I was a smoker for 35 years! I am  a non smoker  now, for the rest of my life! Julie is awesome! I will save in 3 months of not smoking what I paid for the sessions! It is totally worth it!

name: Mrs. Araza
text:
yesterday I went out and bought a size 9 because I can no longer fit in my size 15s any more! This is only my 5 session in my weight lost program... its helped me start exercising more eating right and finding foods I like to eat healthy more... its helped me become healthier on the inside with my heart and soul to get me to where I've lost two pant sizes....

I came in to this with an open mind because I new a few other people that have done hypnosis on to quit smoking and it work same a losing weight... to this day for 10 years they haven't touched a cigarette... as well as the people I know that have done weight lose has stayed small with out gaining any weight back....

I'm sooo excited to get back to where i was before my stroke it has been a big challenge for over a year and a half to lose my weight that I gained because of it... im very happy that I've done the hypnosis if it was it for them i would still be lost...

I'm very thankful ive met her and came to this location. I live in CA/AZ and decided to come here in Alabama. I'm sooo thankful i met her and worked with her!

Thank you sooooo very much for all this work...

name: Ginger Placente
text: Last Sunday I went to church in a smaller size pair of pants and I was very happy. That was only after four sessions of hypnosis to lose weight. I am surprised at the amount of progress this early in the program because I am not on a diet, or restricting what I eat. It just seems to be happening very easy. Next I am going to get a cute little summer dress. It's been years since I have done that. I'm excited.

resp.text: That's awesome! It won't be long before you're a member of the Little Black Dress club!

name: Sarah Hermetz
text: It has given me a new life style. I wasn't this thin in middle school. I am in a place where I can live a full and healthy lifestyle, not only in my weight but with my self. Thank You Julie!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of Robertsdale Hypnosis! We are so pleased you are working for your goals.

name: Ron Dumas
text: I am really interested in hypnosis as an alternative to some limited things like diets. I am here to lose weight,, control my state of mind and get more energized and organized. I believe Julie and Robertsdale Hypnosis can and will help me with these challenges and make me a better and happier person. this will Help me be healthier, happier and more focused with a lot less stress.

resp.text: We are most pleased to be here with you, hand-in-hand as you seek a better you! Thanks for trusting us to join you in this decision.

name: Ginny Stopa
text: This is only my fourth session but just last week I put on a bathing suit for  the first time in over two years. I’m also wearing sleeveless tops because of how many inches I’ve lost already. I have found that it takes WAY less food to make be satisfied at each meal and I never feel deprived. I am so glad I found hypnosis-it is easy and so fun. And I get great results.

resp.text: We are so glad you are with us as well! We are excited for your best future yet!

name: Diane Diane
text: In session 1 I was scared - this was unknown to me and I wondered if hypnosis would work for me. By the 2nd session, NINE THINGS had improved or changed for the better! Wow! In session 3 we did a great technique to get me out of dieting thinking and during that, I began to clearly and easily visualize myself as the thin person I want to be. In fact, I put a picture of a thinner me in a BATHING  SUIT in the screen of my phone to remind me where I’m headed. Who would have thought I could come so far in such a short time! Today is session 4, and I told Julie that last week was a little crazy because I actually had a heart attack! I’m fine now, but of course all my friends brought giant piles of food over to hep me recover. It used to be I would have dived in to all of it, especially the sweets. Instead, none of the sweets interested me. It wasn’t that I wanted them but  “couldn’t” or “shouldn’t” have them - I genuinely didn’t want them. That’s gotta be the hypnosis changing my food preferences, and it was so easy. It is working for me. At week 4 I’m feeling so confident in where I’m going. I’m going to be a size 8, and that’s just how it’s going to go!!

resp.text: YAY! Keep going. Your health will continue to improve as long as you focus on the prize and take each day as the amazing opportunity it is!

name: Bill Nassar
text: We are very pleased with the outcome here at Robertsdale Hypnosis with my step son. It was amazing to see how quickly he relaxed - more so than he has been in years.  i was really skeptical at first, but this isn't like on TV! instead, it gives the tools to be more confident and calm. you rally learn how-to relax, and then so many more thipngs are possible. The office is very professional and the people really know what they're doing,  We got the anxiety relief help we were seeking and are very glad we came. Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your relief! It is the highest compliment to know that we placed you at ease and you enjoyed your visit in our office.

name: Ann Morris
text: I knew hypnosis would be the answer because I tried everything else! I smoked for 55 years up until June 6th. That was my first hypnosis session and I stopped smoking forever. I'm very proud of that date. It was so relaxing, and I found out I was aware of everything, and I felt calmly in control the whole time. The thing I like best about being a non-smoker is I have so much more energy and since my mind isn't racing, I can make decisions better. I like to brag, and everybody who knows me has heard me say, "I'm a NON SMOKER!!" Oh, and I've already saved 75% of what it cost just because I'm not buying cigarettes any more. In a year, I'll have enough to take a cruise! This worked so well, I'd do it again tomorrow.

resp.text: Congratulations! Stay with it and don't loose any ground.

name: thegreenantllc Brandy55
text: My grown son has severe anxiety and depression. We took the normal path for treatment and got improvement but he was still unable to live a normal life. We found Julie at Robertsdale Hypnosis and made the decision to see if hypnosis could help.  With only 3 sessions behind us he is much more relaxed and comfortable handling interactions with others. I reccomend anyone suffering from anxiety or other debilitating conditions to give hypnosis a try, it is certainly working for us.

resp.text: Thank you for this word of encouragement! It's so important to note every situation is different and we love recognizing the needs of every client. We are so excited by the path your son is on.

name: Allen Blood
text:
The staff was very knowledgeable in the techniques that allowed me to progress quickly and easily in my rehab. Even with multiple members helping me over several months, they were all on the same page where my progress was and what the next steps were to be taken. They are light hearted and seem to enjoy their work and the interaction with those that need their help.
I would definitely recommend TherapySouth Vestavia to anyone who needs physical therapy after surgery or injury!

name: Susan Johnson
text: Therapy South has been my favorite place to be since my rotator cuff surgery.  When I arrived there I could not even touch the top of my head, style my hair, or other daily things we take for granted. My surgery humbled me; these therapists motivated me, encouraged me, and made me feel that I could accomplish anything!  My doctors goals seemed unattainable, but with the help of Hannah, Laura, Patrick, both Allans, Jo and Nate, I achieved my goals in five months! With encouragement when I was discouraged, praise when I did well, and personal attention to me, I began to feel a close bond with these gifted people. I began to feel like they were “family,” so when I left today it was bittersweet. I’m proud I met my goals, but sad to leave all of these sweet friends I have made! They not only helped me heal my body, but my spirit and soul. There aren’t enough words to say “Thank you” to the people who gave me my mobility back! I will definitely pop in to visit when I go to Publix!!

resp.text: Great job Susan! We are so proud of you and thankful that you are now part of the TherapySouth family 🙂! We wish you the best!

name: Larry Stone
text:
Today was my last day of PT at Therapy South. My experience at this facility was phenomenal. Everyone was such a professional and friendly and I feel that they became my friends. They also can work as a team to adjust to your needs. I would definitely use this group again but hope I won’t need to.
A special shout out to Armin who put up with me and got my shoulder ( after 2 surgeries) back in great shape.

name: Pary Payne
text:
Everyone here was very kind, friendly, professional, and just down to earth good people. I spent six months doing PT at Therapy South in 2020 after a Mountain Bike wreck and a couple surgery’s on my left shoulder (2 metal plates and 19 screws). I mostly worked with Armin who is great and knows his stuff, but spent enough time there to get to know everyone and they all know their stuff. Really Great people that I highly recommend.

Thank You guys and gals!!

- Daniel Payne

name: Laurie Carey
text: I used Therapy South for some neck/shoulder pain that was also causing a lot of numbness and tingling in my arm, hand, and fingers. From the moment I scheduled my first appointment I had a positive experience. Ryan worked efficiently and communicated well and I always felt comfortable to ask questions and be honest about what I was feeling. The entire staff is friendly and welcoming and work to make the environment and experience positive for their patients.

name: Lilly Welch
text: My experience with TherapySouth Vestavia was wonderful! I came in with a bad sprain from a dance related injury, and Ryan got me up and dancing again in no time! The whole staff is friendly and welcoming, and it is clear that they want you to succeed and get stronger. Ryan was incredibly kind and thorough and made sure that I felt 100% before walking out the door after my last appointment. On top of all of that, they maintained wonderful protocols to help prevent the spread of COVID-19. I felt very safe during my time at the clinic. You can not go wrong with TherapySouth and Ryan!

name: Bob Opkins
text: I've been to Therapy South for several sports injuries over the past 2 years.  Armin has done a great job fixing my knee, neck and leg adductor problems.  I tried several therapists for my neck and none were able to help.  Armin was the only one who was successful using dry needling, manipulation and providing rehab exercises.  I highly recommended Therapy South in Vestavia.  The entire staff is friendly and helpful.

name: Laurie Lorino
text: Alan Spooner is the best physical therapist I have ever been to. He cares about his patients and their progress. He's very patient and has always helped me get better with treatment. The facility is clean, has an upbeat atmosphere and parking is easy. All of the employees at TherapySouth in Vestavia are very friendly and helpful making every visit as enjoyable as possible. I'm sure I'll have other PT needs in the months, years to come and I will always come to this location even though there are other TherapySouth facilities that are closer in location to me.

name: Web Walters
text: Have been going to see Ryan at therapy south vestavia and he’s done a great job working on my issues. Takes time to understand the issue and then works on ways to improve. I’ve been going for a couple months and can see major progress. Highly recommend.

name: Eric Brennan
text: TherapySouth Vestavia is dedicated to make you better.  They get to know your therapy needs and get a plan together to get you up and moving again regardless of fitness level. Hannah, Alan,  Armin, Laura and Jo will make you feel welcomed and are very friendly.  They take care of their patients!

name: Judy Davis
text: Excellent therapists! Very professional and well trained. I benefited tremendously from my therapy sessions with Hannah. Clean, well organized location. It doesn’t get any better than this.

name: Mike Thomas
text:
Fantastic group of PTs who are experienced, professional and positive.  I have had two tours with this crew to rehab after rotator cuff repairs on both shoulders and I could not be more pleased with the outcome.  Thanks to everyone involved!
- Mike Thomas

resp.text: Thank You Mike!

name: Jenny Hebert
text: My experience at TherapySouth Vestavia was excellent.  My therapist, Armin Hornikel, worked with me after a hip surgery, and then several months later for some foot issues.  He always listened to me, never got tired of my questions, and encouraged me to do my best.  He was very good at explaining how the muscles, bones, tendons, and ligaments all worked together and why I needed to do certain exercises to improve my condition.  One of the things I appreciated most was his sense of humor that always left me feeling a little bit lighter each time I left.  Everyone on the staff at TherapySouth Vestavia was friendly and gave me encouragement when I needed it most.  I highly recommend this group.

resp.text: Thank you Jenny!

name: Garrick Stone
text: After surgery for a broken hip, from a cycling accident, I was referred to TherapySouth Vestavia for rehab/PT. Alan Spooner,  Armin Hornikel and the Vestavia team all took exceptional care of me. The team had goals for each visit and pushed me to meet and exceed them. The team also provided me, and other patients, with abundant amounts of (much needed) encouragement with each visit. I had a great experience with the Vestavia team and would recommend them to anyone needing physical therapy services.

name: Chip Denton
text:
Very professional group. The whole team is friendly and work to make patients feel welcome.
Laura is an excellent therapist.She spent time understanding patient goals and expectations and worked with me to achieve them.

resp.text: Thank you Chip!

name: Michael Montenegro
text: Staff is super friendly and Alan Spooner is the best!

name: Jeffery Phillips
text: This has been an outstanding experience for me ( my first ) from start to finish! From my first session until my last the entire team was a true pleasure to work with. The professionalism and compassion with each therapist I was with was obvious and their understanding my injury and my ability to recovery has just been remarkable. Thanks to the entire team for a job well done!

resp.text: Thank you Jeffery!

name: Emily Batson
text: I have had a long road of recovery with multiple knee surgeries. Vestavia Therapy South has been a huge source of help and constant support for me through a long process. They have worked hard and gone above and beyond to make sure all of my needs are met. From Jo at the front desk, to every PT in the establishment, they are all fantastic. I am grateful to have them on my side and I will absolutely suggest them to others and use them again for my own family. Thank you, Therapy South Vestavia, for being so wonderful!

name: Sydney Newsom
text: Being in pain with your mobility hindered can be a very helpless feeling. From the moment I walked in the door here, I knew they were going to take care of me. Everyone you come in contact with is so warm and friendly. My PT, Hannah, was amazing. Unfortunately, I ended up having surgery but when I start back with PT, I won't go anywhere else. I'm partial to Hannah but feel confident that all of the therapists there are competent and caring. The wonderful reviews are all genuine and true. I feel so lucky to have easy access to this location.

name: Ashley Grisham
text: TherapySouth saved my ski trip! Last year I had debilitating pain in my right knee which my doctor had diagnosed as arthritis. But Hannah at TherapySouth Vestavia was not convinced. She determined that it was muscular and began treating me with manual therapy and dry needling. When I first saw her, I was 6 weeks away from a snow ski trip, so our goal was to get me into a condition to ski without pain. Not only did she do that (my trip was AWESOME) but she gave me tips about stretches and exercises I could do at home. Now my knee is completely pain free! I'm so thankful to TherapySouth for their knowledge, compassion and dedication to patient wellness. I highly recommend this practice.

name: David Powell
text: I selected this location of TherapySouth based on their convenient location.  My treatment there could not have been better.  The entire team was helpful, engaging, and caring.  They helped me get my medical issue under control, equipped me with strategies to continue to manage it, and built relationships at the same time.  If you need physical therapy and want a place that is not only convenient, but also has people that care about you as a person as well as a patient, I’d recommend TherapySouth-Vestavia.

name: Victoria Morrison
text: Great people and excellent care! TherapySouth made physical therapy enjoyable to go to and helped with a speedy recovery getting back to what I love. Would recommend to everyone!

name: Melody Warbington
text: I've been to TherapySouth (Vestavia) several times in the last 2-3 years due to knee and shoulder issues, and most recently saw Hannah Cox for my knee after a fall. A few sessions later, and the twinge and pain is gone. Then, I saw Hannah with the hope that a few sessions would delay getting frozen shoulder again, or at least put off getting a shot from my ortho until it had been a year. Therapy + dry needling worked wonders. Hannah and the entire staff are professional, friendly, and they worked hard to make me feel relaxed even when working through the pain, stiffness, and soreness I was experiencing. If you need therapy, this is the place to go!

name: Kaleb Reid
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff!  These guys know how to make you feel comfortable, and do a great job to get you back on your feet.  I love these guys!

name: Angie Kelly
text: Amazing group of excellent therapists with outstanding customer service.

name: Judy Ault
text: A word of advice - ask how quickly you can learn to do exercises at home and ask how much your physical therapy will cost.  My husband went to Therapy South.  Had he known the expense, two sessions would have done the trick.  The billing has been a mess also.  We won't be back.

name: Penny Haft
text: Great people, excellent care.  More than pleased couldn't imagine a more professional group.

resp.text: Thank you Penny! Thought about you today when I saw your Panda Bear. I hope you are well!

name: Brian Sponder
text: Excellent care, thank you!

name: Tim Hardy
text: I typically seed Dr. Sovic but he had an injury the last time I needed a low back epidural. Dr. Landsen did my procedure at this time. All I can say is both of these men are very professional and awesome at what they do. I have to go to them around every three months and I have never had a problem. I would just like to say thank you to the entire team here. Y'all are all awesome!!!!

name: Jeanette Sims
text: Great experience, Great people 👍

name: Susan Tawfik
text: Dr Sovic & staff were AWESOME!  It was my first time having a block and I definitely will use him in the future again when I need to.  Highly recommend to anyone having back problems and need relief!

name: kim seckel
text: Dr. Sovic and his team are the absolute best!  I have been a patient for 16+ years.

name: Jamie Holtzclaw
text:
I would not recommend Dr. Landsen or his nurse to anyone.  They waited until after my 3rd block to tell me that I needed another referral for pain management other than blocks when I had been discussing pain management issues with them since my first block.  I got the 2nd referral and then they closed for a week for spring break, knowing the severe pain I was in.

I was told if the first block on my L-spine did not work, I would need an MRI.  The physical therapist that has been doing needling on me said I would need to try physical therapy if the needling did not last at least a week.  I left several messages asking for the MRI and PT orders as well as requested pain med to get me through but never received a call back.  I ended up having to get a referral to a different clinic and now have to wait for an opening while having to deal with this pain.

Dr. Landsen was also trying to diagnose me with something I do not even have during my last block.

When I first asked for something for pain until the blocks worked, Allison, Dr. Landsen ‘s nurse, told me they like to try alternative methods but not once did they offer any suggestions.

Allison also breached HIPPA that is a major violation.

All these circumstances are very concerning.  The patient advocacy is severely lacking here as well as professionalism.

name: kim mahan
text: The Drs and nurses are very sincere and helpful every time I am there.

name: Emily Hanes Cook
text: Every single person that worked there was so nice and it felt like they all genuinely cared about my well being.  I was very pleased with my experience!  Best medical experience I've ever had.

name: aneta Tucker
text: I love this place. They were extremely caring. This is the first place I went that was concerned about me.

name: Joshua Ray CB
text: Dr Sovic and his staff truly listen to you issues and respond accordingly.

name: Genia Rowe
text: Dr Sovic has been my Pain Management Physician for years. He is top notch in his field. His staff is friendly and always on their game. I would recommend Dr Sovic and his staff to anyone with chronic pain.

name: Angel Moore
text: They don't deserve 1 star.  Dr Kraus just about killed me with a patch that interacted with my blood pressure medicine. After he took me off of my normal pain medicine. I have been seeing him since January and have been in pain the whole time.  If you like to hurt, he's the one for you!

name: 316 Construction
text: I felt completely comfortable from the time I walked in the door, until I left. My condition was explained to me completely  and thoroughly. Doc worked his magic and I  had instant relief. No drugs, no long wait time. No x-rays, MRI's  and all the other hoops that "conventional  doctors " put their patients  through.  I am going to refer Alamo to everyone I know

name: grant smith
text: Dr Phil has been my chiropractor for over 10 years He gives the best adjustments in the area. I should know as I also happen to be a chiropractor

name: Mark Hasty
text: I dropped by Alamo Chiropractic on the way to the beach because of back pain, and was seen very quickly. The care was fantastic and allowed me to enjoy 2 days on the golf course. I would highly recommend A.L.A.M.O to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the review!

name: Larreh Venegas
text:
I went because i had major back pain. I was missing school because the pain was so bad and I came here a couple of times explaining my pain but he seemed to only know how to do one routine and he told my older brother and father that
“I had been faking my pain.”
I don’t understand how a doctor could say that when they barley checked me and my father believed him and even though I complained they thought I was “faking” I went about 2 months without treatment but I couldn’t stand it and went to a orthopedic all I did was explain the same way I did at A.L.A.M.O and he took a x-ray and said
“just what I guessed you have spinal juvenile arthritis” So I guess I wasn’t faking my pain but thanks for making my dad believe I was.

I came in with pain in my neck and upper left side of my back. Dr. Kaul diagnosed it as a pinched nerve. I followed his recommendations as far as at home treatment combined with the adjustments he did in office and now the pain and tingling in my arm is gone.

I now see him once a month.

P.S. The girls up front are sweet and accommodating as well.

Thank you so much.

text: Wonderful experience with Dr. Dixon and her crew.

name: MORGEN COLE
text: Dr. Dixon is excellent and the staff there is awesome as well!! Definitely recommend AST!!

name: Kassie Dizzy
text: While I could type a novel's worth of praise for this office, I'll keep this short and sweet. The nurses are the ABSOLUTE BEST. They always had a smile when I walked in(mainly because I was normally their last patient for the day, ha!) and treated me like family, not just a number on the sign in list. I was involved in a hit and run back in January and had a lot of anxiety about the whole chiropractic process but Dr. Kaul and his ladies continued to assure me that I was in the best and most capable hands, literally. My appointment days quickly became the days I looked forward to, especially Mondays and Fridays because no after-work-beer could compare to a short 20 minute therapy and realignment before my 45 min commute home followed by a good, hot tub soak. This is coming from a 29 year old. I will happily recommend Dr. Kaul and any of his associates to everyone who needs a good, knowledgeable staff with a touch of home. Thank y'all so much! Never change. Well... maybe do a small expand for a whirlpool/sauna. No, scratch that idea. I may never leave your office, haha!

name: Billy Keene
text: I can't say enough about the humble, caring, professional staff at Mobile Chiropractic Associates. I can honestly say that I had never been to a chiropractor before my accident in June. When you are there you are treated like family, made to feel at home, and given the best care anyone can ask for, bar none. Special thanks to Dr. Doug Kaul who took very good care of my wife, my son, and myself. His bedside manner is outstanding. Mobile Chiropractic Associates are the cream of the crop when it comes to care and sincerity in doing all they can for their patients. There is hardly ever a wait and you can almost name your appointment time to fit your schedule.

Very grateful to have found this practice for treatment, and from what I've heard from other patients, the other doctors there are exceptional as well.

name: kat
text:
They have the best prices and must effective treatment available. Dr. Kaul and his staff were very friendly and helpful. I woke up with crippling neck pain---literally---my mom had to come to my house and help me out of bed, that's how great my neck pain was,  I was completely helpless in trying to use my neck muscles to lift my head up from my pillow!

Instead of going to an urgent care facility like how I initially planned, my mom suggested going to a chiropractor because she had similar issues in her hip and she told me how a chiropractor adjusted her joints back into place and she was able to walk out of the office after that as if the pain never existed. She recommended Mobile Chiropractic and I decided to give it a shot. Dr. Kaul worked his magic with his hands on my neck and did something funny to it and cracked my neck back into place and I almost immediately felt a hundred times better!  If you have any type of musculoskeletal pains, I highly recommend you go to Mobile Chiropractic. I, without a doubt, am sure they can help you!

name: dave brownlow
text:
Great front office staff and everyone is very helpful and nice.
Dr. Kaul is very thorough and great with patients!

text: Very friendly place, they took care of me and my fiancé after a accident. We was treated like a priority and I felt like they truly genuine care. I highly recommend this place for anyone.

text: Everytime I go here they treat me like a neighbor. Very friendly staff . Dr.Kaul makes sure to take care of you to the best to his knowledge . I'd recommend if you are having any type of back or neck problems to give him a visit.

name: Maggie Mitchell
text: I injured the posterior tibial tendon in my foot over 2 years ago. After many visits to podiatrist and ortho doctors, I ended up here on my own suggestion. My tendon had healed but the inflammation was so severe I couldnt even shop with my daughter the weekend before I started coming. After 4 underwater ultrasound therapy session and adjustments my ankle is back to my normal size and pain free for the first time in 2 years and no medicines involved !!! All the staff (including the therapist and Dr. Kaul) is super friendly and makes you feel like family. Had no idea I would feel so great so quickly !! Will definitely be back whenever I get any aches/pains !!

name: alexya harrison
text: Great Staff and Dr.Kaul is awesome .. I will tell anybody to come here for chiropractor service .

name: NoMercenary
text:
In short summary, these are great people, made me feel comfortable, and i would recommend to others. The staff always had a smile on their faces, and treated me like family. The doctors I dealt with were very friendly, open to any questions/concerns. Awesome experience, everytime.

Longer version, but adds great insight..
I dislocated my knee years ago, and needed help FAST. I was without insurance but they said they could still help. They gave me a discounted rate, and began trying to treat me.
In short, i torn a ligament, and had to have surgery, so the doctor sent me to a colleague.
Flash forward years later, and i'm having harsh pains in my lower back, from my work field. I return to this clinic, because of previous great services. My original doc wasn't working anymore, so i was taken in by Dr Kaul himself.
This continued for weeks, him helping keep my pain at a good, manageable level. I started to go less and less, as the pain started to simply vanish...Till...
I got into a car wreck. My neck started to feel awful sore 2 days later, and i got worried.
I then began looking for an accident lawyer, and through high google reviews, went to Moore's law-firm. I spoke with them, and was asked if i was being treated for the pain. I told them not yet, but i used to go to a local chiropractor, and was gonna go back very, very soon.
I was asked where i went, and when told, the lawyer started laughing, the doctor, and the lawyer have been college for the longest time, and the lawyer sends hundreds of cases to Dr Kaul....Huh, small world..
My lawyer knows my doctor..
So to shorten this some, i was treated by Dr Kaul over a couple months, and even looked forward to it; talking to the staff, even becoming friends. The fact i felt so much better after leaving left a great association with the habit of going a couple times a week.
After treatment, my papers were directly presented to Mr Moore, and he helped me with my case in a very straight forward manner.
So between these two professionals, and their staffs, i felt very taken care of, and confident that i was more than a $ symbol with legs.
A++

name: Stephanie Vaughn
text: Dr. Douglas Kaul, his associates and the staff of the Mobile Chiropractic Associates are the best!  In just 2 weeks of treatment, I am moving more freely; sleeping soundly and feeling great!  Unfortunately, my back problem began to surface after a minor exercise routine, 2 years ago.  My husband suggested I find a chiropractor to see if that type of treatment would be helpful.  After checking reviews, calling several chiropractic offices and listening for a voice with a caring, understanding attitude, along with their ability to answer my questions, I found Mobile Chiropractic Associates.  Tonya, medical secretary/receptionist, took time to speak with me and answer my questions in a kind, courteous and unhurried manner.  I have received great care!  Dr. Douglas Kaul is very knowledgeable, is down to earth and doesn't pull punches. He shows and explains all he finds on the x-rays, which he takes himself.  He makes you feel comfortable; listens to your concerns regarding your treatment options and plan, answering any questions you may have.  Diane, his nurse, is very nice and engages you; always finding something to say to make you smile. As evidenced by the x-rays, my neck and lower back were slightly out of line and in that very first visit, I had an adjustment.  I didn't know what to expect during the process and Dr. Kaul explained everything and was gentle.  That day was the best I had ever felt in a long time and I am feeling even better, today! Dr. Kaul, his associates and staff have great compassion for every person who comes for help.   After your first visit, you will realize the care you receive is focused on getting you up and moving again, as pain free as possible.  Before you decide to give up; suffer through the pain; limit your activities and just take pain pills, epidurals or opt for surgery, find a well-qualified, caring, chiropractic physician.  I would like to suggest one such physician to you: Dr. Douglas Kaul at Mobile Chiropractic Associates.

name: Kris Lowery
text: I will say believe me or not but if you need a chiropractor try Dr Kaul one visit and see for yourself. Excellent all around.

name: Claudia Schreier

text: I loved him hes very good theral.   Great dr ....  ..

name: robin wellington
text: I cant not ask for better  doctors and staff they are great

name: Sheila Rogers
text: I only started coming to Dr Thacker recently my third visit today and of course I messed up on my appointment day it wasn't until the next day but the lady at the front desk talked to him and got me in today. I really appreciate him and his staff. He listens to what you have to say about my pain and does know what he's doing. I just can't thank him or his stuff for all they do to help. I'm glad I'm his patient.

name: Jules Oyler
text: When I moved to Alabama from Phoenix I needed assistance changing pain management doctors - the staff there were very nice and did an awesome job of getting me set up. Dr. Thacker is very good - I have worked in the medical profession for all my career and I have to say that he is not only the best pain management doctor I have experienced, but one of the best doctors, hands down, that I have had the privilege of knowing! If youre here, you’ve made a good choice!

name: Sarah Pickerill
text: Dr T. is superb! I feel safe with his advice and HE KNOWS PAIN! That's why he's the best

name: JM Barnes
text:
Dr Thacker is great. Excellent. His support staffing is horrendous. Scheduling is a joke. I truly like the doctor. He is very informative and knowledgeable. But sitting in a lobby chair for a hour. Especially when you are there specific for having a broken back and extensive hardware. Makes the wait in those chairs unbearable.torture. if you are a sufferor of degenerative disc disease you know exactly what I mean.

update

I have since returned to using this practice. Everything I mentioned was corrected. The lady that was so rude is no longer there. And everyone is back to friendly smiling faces. Great job to Huntsville Pain Management.

name: Beverly Holcomb
text: I basically agree with everything the other person a couple of months  ago said. He's a great doctor and has changed my life but this Sherri lady is so rude. And I too have heard her talking about other patients. She's very unprofessional for that environment.

name: Manay Clark
text: Dr. Thacker has been treating my menopause symptoms with bioidentical hormones for six years. These treatments have given my life back. My GI tract did not absorb oral hormone supplements. Consequently, I had problems associated with extremely low hormone levels: cognitive deficits, sleep disturbances, difficulty making decisions, migraine headaches, fatigue, bloating, reduced libido, and severe hot flashes. Dr. Thacker's program returned me to health. The treatment itself is not painful. Dr. Thacker is very gentle. And I can't say enough about the staff. I'm sure I've given them a few headaches, but they're always positive, cheerful, and accommodating.

name: Scott Gray
text:
Been to many pain centers. Dr T. is the only one, the only one ever to listen to me. I have been and had more pain free days in the last 60 then all the good days combined in 25 years. I am sold and happy

29 July 2016.

It has been a couple years now I have been seeing the Doc.  I am still very impressed and like most, am a more functional human being.  To not have to ask my wife to lift (she still does worry about my back because it will go out) something brought back some manhood to me.

name: Katie Southerland
text: The best doctor ever!! All the staff are exceptionally sweet and helpful. I've never felt better since I started here 1 year ago.  Thank you Dr.Thacker and all of the staff!! A++++

name: Joany Zilke
text:
I love & adore Dr. Thacker, Kelly, and the staff.

Chronic pain patients have been made to look like pariahs in society today because of the big opioid epidemic. Dr. Thacker will not make you feel like an addict, but will work on different areas of the body to help relieve the pain with the goal of getting you off narcotic pain meds if possible.

He & Kelly both can use dry needling (which is similar to acupuncture), and it is miraculous! It’s a wonderful feeling to go in with knots in your shoulders & come out relaxed and not carrying the weight of the world on them. Now, if I could just get them to do house calls 3x a week to do this..... well, I’m getting carried away. These wonderful people are now like an extension of my family, they care about their patients, and for that I’m grateful.

I know there are people out there that are just looking for a place that will give you drugs.... this isn’t the place.

name: Nathan
text: Dr Thacker literally saved my life!  He has helped me so much. His staff could improve on helpfulness and courtesy but he is a great dr!

name: Testing Home Remedies
text: Great place to go. I played soccer for 11yrs and it has taken its tole, after seeing Dr. Thacker and his nurse practitioner I can now perform my day to day activities pain free. Thank you Dr. Thacker and all your staff.  Very nice!!!

name: Lorraine Strobel
text:
It seemed like they like to prescribe narco to control pain more than using other methods. I never had a plan explained to me .how I would have my pain controlled. I had to suggest radio frequency ablation which when done gave me a bad cramp . I still have have that cramp 10 months later . I was told I got it because my core too weak.  I told him it hurt my knee to walk and was told to suck it up. I went to orthopedist and was told not to do the long walks that I have a baker cyst and torn meniscus and needed pt.
I am giving 3 stars only because at first he did do needling, etc. . Then it completely stopped for 11 months. Only told how I should use the narco 3x a day. I stopped taking it. I would rather not get addicted to it.

name: T Williams
text: Dr Thacker and Charlotte are AMAZING!! They get 5 stars!!! Have alot of Orthopedic issues and a Digestive disease problem and the treatment is working very well. My ankle was almost severed off years ago from a car wreck. 8 surgeries later and the pain never completely went away. Just lived with it. Dr. Thacker did an injection treatment on it today and it was a miracle. The pain is non existent at the moment and im not hobbling around in pain. I am feeling so much better ever since i started as a patient of his. He has an excellent bed side manner and cares what you have to say and listens to all your concerns and takes his time. The downfall is the nurses will rush him out of the room. If it was subtle and not noticicle it wouldnt be so bad. But its not. But Excellent Doctor, Excellent Practice and good people. If you're lucky enough to get the nurse Charlotte and Dr. Thacker together thats a blessing!! Charlotte listens and really cares what you have to say without interruptions and is very professional. Best nurse and doctor ive come across in 20 years. 5 STARS!!

name: Nora Lee
text: Dr. Thacker approached my  pain problem with an innovative, individualized treatment plan based on an accurate diagnosis. He was compassionate, persistent, and effective.

name: Tisha Johnson
text: Seems all these reviews praise Dr. T for the help he has given to them.  Is there anyone that has had a bad experience with him?  I'm at my current pain center and extremely unhappy, I'm repeatedly told I'm a liar after they have told me something and I have to pay extra to have a "comprehensive" visit just to discuss my medications.  I'm seeking a doctor that will actually listen to me and my problems which is many.  I have a doctor for just about every body system and every one of them actually listen to me as I know my body best.  They are proud to be treating me as many consider me a 'walking miracle' as I was in a coma and developed ARDS that 75% of people die from.  I should know, I live in it.  I've got to find a pain doctor that will listen to me and get this pain under control.  Currently I just the place I'm going to is just collecting my money without helping and I've been there 3 years in October!!!

name: Billy Ray
text: I am going to leave a completely honest review. This is my first visit. Front office staff was good. Dr. Thacker was great! Very thorough examination, felt confident with what he had to tell me. Was onboard with his plan, thought everything was going great. Then came the simple task of printing out prescriptions and leaving. The first set of prescriptions were incorrect, I thought ok life happens. Went back in let the receptionist know that the prescription was possibly printed out wrong. Nurse brought the Dr. out to "explain" the prescription to me. He "explained", left the reception area (really was a fan of having anything "explained" to me in the reception area especially by the Dr.) Nurse was then very adamant that the system is not wrong. I insisted, she resisted, but finally went back to check. I thought no harm, no foul, 10 minutes later the nurse comes out and hands me the "corrected" prescriptions. I said that I was sorry (wait what am I even sorry for) she said "that's ok". Make it to the elevator only to have them wrong AGAIN. I go back in let the receptionist know that maybe they printed out wrong again. The nurse comes out smirks, takes them back. A little quicker this time she comes out hands to me, "corrected" again. I get to the elevator and thinking noway they are wrong again, lo and behold, AGAIN. This by now had lost its "no harm, no foul" charm. I go back in she takes them back. I think of a possible issue with the prescriptions that the pharmacy may have. So, while she is about to make a copy of the prescriptions and has the Dr. sign it. I interuptered her and tried to mention the possible issue, only to be interrupted by what I gather is the nurse practioner to be told "that is what the system says, so it is what it is" tried couple more times to explain my concern to the point I was like just forget it. So, I am assuming that is the extent of my patient-Dr. relationship there, sadly. But, this is for anyone that may read this from this office. I suffer from severe depression and severe anxiety and no, not related to the pain (pain certainly doesn't help). I know you probably do not care but my world is practically falling apart. Now, pain has cost me my job and yea that stings for anyone but with the issues I suffer from I realize I am not capable of seeing the forest for the trees and decent coping skills. I was more than polite to everyone involved until my last encounter of being interrupted. But please remember people are not in your office because they want to be and for the love of God please understand that people have to deal with life's kicks outside of those walls of your office. Please just take the time to be kind with in reason. Thanks

name: Ladonice Waldrep-Neamtu
text: Dr. Thacker and his staff are very personable. I have been seeing Dr. Thacker for about four years. In that time Dr. Thacker has developed a very specialized approach to manage the pain I have due to an MVA. He has helped me find the light at the end of a very dark tunnel; through a balanced approach that includes the body, mind and spirit. I highly recommend Dr. Thacker to anyone that is experiencing an acute bout of pain or suffering from a chronic painful illness or injury.

name: Pamela CG
text: I've been going to Dr. Thacker for a few months now and have been feeling "iffy" about him since I started. The first day I walked in, he said he'd have me in "Olympic shape" in no time without even seeing what was wrong. I was paying him $100 a week to do therapies that ultimately didn't last more than a day for chronic back pain that I've been suffering for more than 7 years. Every week, he'd tell me something different that I'd need to do and would get aggravated at me because I couldn't afford to keep trying therapies that weren't working. But the kicker came when I finally started feeling a bit better by doing various exercises that helped me tolerate my constant pain better and I had an appointment where I was going to tell him I'd just delay the epidural shot we were planning. The night before, however, one of my boys started throwing up and had thrown up 5 times over the night and I had no choice but to cancel my appointment. I told them there was really no need for me to reschedule at the moment, that I was doing somewhat better and wanted to see how my body handled the new exercise. They said they'd have to charge me a $25 fee for an "unacceptable cancelation". Are you kidding me? How am I supposed to be able to control when my kids get sick? I'd been considering switching doctors to begin with because I didn't feel like he was meeting my needs, but that sealed it. So what about the almost 2 hours that I sat in the waiting room on my first visit past my appointment time? What about the time I've lost waiting for late appointments? Who's going to compensate me for that? I'm disgusted that I've spent so much money on them for nothing other than to have them pretty much spit in my face when I had a sick kid.

name: Lisa Lewis
text: My husband is a patient of Dr Thackers and I could not be more pleased. Dr. T suggested alternative ways to help my husband with his chronic pain such as excersize, acupuncture, and he gave him a list of books to read on his diagnosis as well as his pain medicine. I don't like when someone suggest that a Dr is not caring or is not doing his job simply b/c he writes a prescription for a Narcotic  pain medication. It could be b/c he is empathetic, he truly cares about his patients and fellow man and does not want to anyone suffer needlessly. There is an epidemic raging thru our society and I can understand the pause physician give before writing anyone any type of pain medication. That's why we need Drs like Dr. Thacker who can understand the law and know exactly how to help his patients. I for one applaud him and his very professional and discreet staff.

name: Roger “RPP” Pittman
text:
Hey everybody my name is ROGER & I'm a Cancer patient, I had stage 3 brain Cancer I went to Birmingham for surgery.. I'm so thankful for surviving although wen I left the hospital I had 89 staples n my head, but I was still pretty.lol
I have to go to CCI every 6mths for MRI bcuz I have 2 brain tumors on the main muscle of my left eye which my Cancer doc told me I will go blind in that eye eventually, since surgery I'm on Disability since I was 30yrs old can't drive bcuz I'm also a seizure patient but my memory is so bad I'm so embarrassed by it.
I try to live my life bcuz of my kids which I wld die for them, I go to Dr. Thacker every month bcuz I have chronic pain for over 12-15yrs..
With my brain tumors, 3 herniated disc n my neck, 3 bulging disc & degenerate disc disease n my back... Dr. Thacker to me is awesome!, we're r still working on the rite pain medication rite now but trust me I've been to enough pain docs but all they care about is money... I'm relieved thou that Dr. Thacker is getting better after his surgery bcuz no matter what all these negative patients say he's one HELL of a Doctor Who really cares about his patients, the nurses who cares if they talk about other patients they have every rite to it's not against the law that they Gossip...
So no matter what I'm very proud & THANKFUL for Dr. Thacker...

name: Jennifer “Jenn” Swoards
text: I have been seeing Dr. Thacker since May 2014. I was permanently disabled for over 3 years at that point. I was also only 32 years old. I couldn't walk, couldn't sit and definitely couldn't work. I have 2 young girls. I felt helpless. I moved from PA to AL in 2010 and had nothing but horrible experienced with the doctors down here. Seems all I was finding were ones that just wanted more money for less time and constantly being misdiagnosed. So badly I had to have an emergency Splenectomy because of a tumor that had grown in my spleen overtaking it. The kicker is Huntsville Hospital found it in 2010 and never told me. Needless to say I almost died.   That terrified me. I  didn't even want to seek medical care because of what I had already experienced. This left me in an enormous amount of pain. I found HPM in April 14' and read up on Doc and got a referral. Doc saved my life. He listened to me, evaluated me and not o lay gave me medication but did needle treatment. I went home crying. It was the first time I could touch my feet in years. My muscle was that bad around my L5 area. Within 6 months I was off disability and working at NASA. Finally able to lead a normal life. He cares. He doesn't force anything you don't want. He knew at one point I didn't have insurance so he didn't push extra things on me that cost money. He cared more about if I was ok. He's met my girls and my husband and I introduce him as the man who saved me. Yeah maybe there have been some iffy staff over the years but let me go on and tell ya they get in everywhere. Doc and his staff has done an amazing job at weeding them outa d keeping the ones that do a great job. He doesn't even like to Hear that someone was treated unfairly. He will fix it. And anyone that says he didn't help. They were only there for one thing. And he is not a pill pusher. But I could name 3 other places in Huntsville that are and maybe you should go there.

name: Inigo Montoya
text: Read my review all the way through to understand my 2 stars even though I love Dr T!  He has made such a difference in my life!  I can function day to day with my kids and do the things I need to do to be mom and a productive citizen!  Most pain clinics in our area have stopped any daily medications after the fall of Dr. Aggarwal, and unfortunately this affects the lives of many people.  Before I came to Dr Thacker, my pain management doctor was doing procedure after procedure and collecting that insurance money and my surgical copay month after month.  I could not get out of bed in the mornings.  I came to Dr Thacker and he not only got me on a daily pain medication regiment, but he also a total body workup and found vitamin and mineral levels along with hormones out of whack and gave me suggestions on what supplements to add and how much, and I have never felt this well before!  I wake up every morning close to pain free (compared to where I was before he came into my life) and energized!  He is open to alternative therapies like dry needling (like acupuncture) and other less conventional treatments like chiropractic and massage.  I love all of the nurses, they're all so sweet.  There's one young lady at the window, Wendy, Lindy, Lindsey, or Penny, (I can never catch her name but it sounds like one of those) she wears glasses and has long hair that has some curl to it.  She is so precious.  The other girl at the window has never mentioned her name, but she's skinny and her hair has been up the times I've seen her.  I don't care for her.  She's very cold and unwelcoming, and she only does the bare minimum to get buy.  Don't expect her to go out of her way for you on anything.  She's also on her personal phone every time I sign in.  The lady that did  my drug test at my first appointment, Shari was her name, is also rude.  I've been in an exam room and overheard her and skinny receptionist gossiping about a patient talking about they don't think he had a legitimate pain and he just comes through for medication.  The truthfulness of that doesn't matter, but that is between the doctor and the patient, not a sub par receptionist and a lady who plays with urine all day.  It's a shame I have to rate Dr T so low because of these two nitwhits, but they're the face of his practice.  If he hadn't made such an improvement to my life, I would find another clinic.

name: Michael Little
text: Dr. Thacker and staff are great!!! Dr. Thacker cares for the people he sees!!!!

name: Christopher Loftin
text: Dr Thacker and staff are great.

name: Joseph Clem
text: They are miracle workers!

name: Dawn Armstrong
text:
They're discriminating against people with Medicare and they talk politics in front of patients.
The staff is very unprofessional!

name: K S
text: Please understand everybody is not a junkie. Please treat people accordingly. This place is nice and professional alittle slow but professional. I'm still a patient Dr's and PA are good

name: Martha Davis
text: I love Dr. Gibson and the rest of the staff at the Birmingham pain center.  I’ve been going to the pain center for the past 15 years and everyone has always been so nice and helpful.  Whenever I’m in pain with  my neck or my back he always tries to stop the pain. Dr. Gibson makes you feel like he is concerned about your well being and you always see and talk to him before a procedure is done.

name: Matt Powell
text: I had a pain block done there recently.  When I was 1st contacted for an appointment (with it being a PAIN CENTER), I believe it was ASSUMED I was calling for a prescription for pain medication.  I was told it would take some time before I could be seen.  I had to tell the person twice that I was ONLY calling to set an appointment for a PAIN BLOCK, NOT a prescription for pain meds.  If that person had paid more attention to the referral, they would have known that.  Thankfully after I made that point clear, I was able to be seen that afternoon.  Once there and was back for the actual procedure, the ladies in the back were MUCH more cordial & had a lot better “bedside manner” if you will.  MUCH KUDOS to the staff in the back but the first couple of people I encountered had me worried this was going to be another doctor’s office where they just wanted to get you “in and out”.  I give it three stars - front office staff - not so much.  Staff in the back before the procedure - MUCH BETTER so I split the difference if you will.

name: Wes Thompson
text: Dr Gipson and his staff have always provided professional and caring care to me and my wife. God bless him and his staff

name: Jessica Powell
text: My husband is currently getting a procedure done. The staff could greatly benefit from a customer service training. Having worked in the medical field I understand it can be difficult and people are sometimes difficult however if all employees encountered come off as rude, unhelpful and indifferent it makes for a very uncomfortable experience for all involved. We’ve had trouble from moment one simply due to not listening. Hoping they improve.

name: SCJ Sims
text: Dr. Chang is the reason I chose and will continue to choose The Birmingham Pain Center. I have numerous health issues and I’ve seen so many different doctors over the years, but never have I received this level of compassion. He is not only sympathetic but an excellent doctor who listens before suggesting a care plan. Dr. Chang is responsible for putting me on the road to wellness.

name: BamaLen G.
text:
Dr. Gibson is WONDERFUL!  He is kind and informative and will answer EVERY question you have!
Also, my PA-C, Amalee Smith, is AWESOME!  I am continuously blow away by how kind and informative this entire staff is!
Dr. Gibson, Amalee, the nurses, and the entire administrative staff are all the same!
I love this place!

name: Cathy Chesser
text: I have been a patient with BPC for over 15 year's.  I have always received excellent service with the staff overall. From the time you walk in you are meet with a smile and checked in, the wait time is always short when your called by a friendly nurse who works you up for the physician assistance or  physician who is awesome. They are up to date on all of the new technology and, if they can't take care of you they will make sure that you will see someone that will.

name: Earlene Coffey
text:
I have been receiving treatment from B'ham Pain Centers staff, well over 15 years.  I have Chronic Pain and every so often I have to receive an injection in one or two areas of my spine. I started out with Dr.Bunker before he moved away. That was when they were at the "other" Valleydale Rd location.  Then I started seeing John over off Hwy. 280 at Greystone, even up until recently in the new location.  You really get use to seeing the same one after several years but all of sudden (or so it seemed) John was gone and I had to start seeing a new PCA . Today will be the 3rd or 4th time I have been in to see Amalee and I sure hope it's a smoother visit than the last ones that I have had with her.  Other than that everything is going well I highly recommend them.  The majority of staff are extremely nice, patient, friendly and very accommodating.eg.Ms Shirley who use to be in charge of checking in😊 The lady in charge of that now, even though I've been seeing her there ever since I started there.  I have no idea what her name is because every time she sees me coming (at least it appears to me) her name badge is flipped.   I'm almost always checked in the back ( vital statistics) by Ms Gladys. She is and has been very nice every nice. If anyone asked me if I would choose this team all over again.
The answer is....... WITHOUT AN OUNCE OF HESITATION...YES!!!

name: Kevin Still
text: Everyone is kind, friendly, and professional. I have never felt fear or any negativity. The staff always does his or her best to make me as calm and comfortable as possible.

name: Christine Watts
text: Helpful and professional. My only complaint is that they charge a fee just to email in a prescription refill. I was not impressed with that but otherwise good.

name: Carol Thompson
text: I have always had a great experience with this place. Everyone is supper nice and ready to get you help.

name: Kim Peters
text: Unprofessional, won’t return calls. Would not recommend this place to anyone. My PA, would not call me back after 4 requests. Her name is Melissa. Will not go there again.

name: Eric Morrison
text:
Nothing but positive things to say about “The Birmingham Pain Center.” The Doctors and PA’s and also the Nurses go above and beyond to help you. Please remember your not the only person walking this battle in life and just because you had 1 bad experience doesn’t mean you should blast the other 9 fabulous experiences you had previously. I’ve been a patient here for over 10 years. Please understand I don’t just post reviews freely unless they are well deserved.

God Bless These Incedible People!!

name: Tom Bullington
text: Great care facility, well organized, procedure went very smooth.

name: Bruce Smith
text: Yeah

name: Terrie Lassiter Gowan
text: Love my docs

name: Lindsey Pourciau
text: Their team was quick to get me in to be seen. Chris took so much time to hear about my issues, be proactive about treating, and providing me information to use at home! Very pleased with the service and care!

name: Alison Singerhouse
text: Chris Allison and Andrew Darwin are excellent physical therapists. Best in the area as far as I am concerned. I send many patients over there for care and they are always happy. They are professional and educated you on what you are doing and why you are doing it. Also excellent at relieving pain associated with therapy. I surely appreciate them for all they do for me!

name: Stephen Sistrunk
text: I have been to see Andrew Darwin now for a knee surgery rehab and two unrelated back issues. On all three occasions, he has gotten me feeling better and back in action much quicker than I would've expected. This guy is very skilled! Across the board, the service and treatment at the Riverchase office is top notch. I would highly recommend going there for your rehab needs.

name: gary dutton
text: Chris Allison is the best. My boys play baseball and have been seeing him at the clinic for the past several years for normal recovery and rehab. He has great knowledge, cares about and communicates great with his patients.  He is very innovative with therapy.  Chris and the clinic also are very accommodating in working with their patients in regards to scheduling.

name: Jo Nicholas
text: Andrew is very knowledgeable, efficient, and patient. Highly recommend. Appointments are easy to make, building way to find.

name: Robert Scott
text: The Therapists are the greatest. Even though I’m a terrible patient and complain constantly, they continue to work with me. The improvements are obvious, and I am so grateful for the results.

name: Morgan Henderson
text: I come to get dry needled in my upper back and neck and always feel so much better afterwards. Chris does a great job!

name: Avione Allgood
text: Amazing!!! They make treatment and rehab enjoyable and interesting instead of overly repetitive. The best part it always and actually works. Great team at Therapy South

name: Sherri Dunn
text: The staff is great! So convenient to my work and home!

name: Brandon Hoggle
text: These guys are awesome! I had injured my shoulder in a softball accident and needed to do some basic rehab. Andrew and Chris quickly identified exercises, along with dry needling, to expedite the healing process. I’ve seen steady improvement since my last visit with them and wouldn’t hesitate to pay them another visit when/if needed. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for the food truck schedule!  Our pleasure man!

name: Barry Harrison
text: Therapy South has been great ! Chris and Andrew have both been amazing. After my first session Chris messaged me to check and see how I was doing. Andrew and  Chris both really showed me they  genuinely care and wanted to get me back to my training. It isn’t a cooking cutting place where they treat everyone the same , I felt that each time I was in there that they had a personalized workout just to help me with my sport. (MMA) I recommend them to anyone even if  it’s for your grandma just wanting to walk better or if you’re a pro athlete !! I think everyone there is great and they  even make it fun !

resp.text: Cool man. We loved having you!

name: Valley Tax Partners
text: I was referred by a friend and am so grateful. All the staff is friendly and attentive. Chris and Andrew have been great to work with to figure out what is going on with my situation. text: Chris Allison is so great! He worked me in very quickly for shoulder pain. He is super knowledgeable and works well with athletes! Will definitely be going back in the future!

text: The first time I used TherapySouth Riverchase was 4 years ago when I tore my ACL and meniscus. Chris and Lauren were amazing at getting me back on my feet. He was very helpful with any questions or concerns I had before and after the procedure. I have and will always recommend the Riverchase location to my friends and family because they truly care about you and work hard to help you properly overcome an injury.

name: Jesse Masters
text: Recently hurt my back squatting during a workout. I have never had an experience with physical therapy and was skeptical of some techniques such as dry needling. Andrew took a holistic approach to treatment and made sure that I was educated about the anatomy, techniques and recovery. As a former athlete, it’s important to be treated by a professional with the same eagerness that I have to get me well. Incredible experience and noticeable results after my first session. I would highly recommend seeing Andrew Darwin!

resp.text: Glad you came !!  Look forward to seeing back on the squat rack.

text: Chris Allison and staff at Therapy South helped me completely get back to normal life after having “frozen shoulder”. text: I came in after I tore my rotator cuff. I was super disappointed and frustrated that it wasn't healing and I had lost so much strength. I trust and respect the whole team here and will recommend them to my friends.

name: F Blanchard
text: Great place to go for physical therapy! Chris, Corey, and the entire staff is friendly and professional. I had surgery for rotator cuff tear.   Doctor installed a shoulder anchor and instructed me to keep immobilized for 10 days before starting therapy.  The 1st day of therapy, I could not move my arm.  I had to wear a pillow sling for 6 weeks.  After 12 weeks I have total movement back and am now working on weights to strengthen. If you need any therapy, this is the best location.

resp.text: Glad your shoulder is doing so well.  It was a pleasure working with you!

I would highly recommend them to friends, family and anyone who might need help along the way to feel better.

resp.text: Thank you Dana!  It was a pleasure working with you.

text: I'm a massage therapist and have been experiencing issues with my right shoulder/neck/hand due to an impingement on some nerves.referred from a client,I tried dry needling for the first time and I cannot believe the amount of relief I have in my arm after one session. name: Katrina Chapman
text: I had two surgeries before the age of 20 because of wear and tear from over a decade of swimming. Both were done by the same surgeon. My first surgery was in November of 2015. I did physical therapy at another Hoover clinic (not a therapy south) and I grew to hate physical therapy, physical therapists, anything associated with them. I honestly believed the profession was a crock because of the poor care I had received at that clinic. I didn’t know any better! My hip never got better, it was much weaker than before, and three years later, is still in pain and lacking the function I had prior. My skepticism towards physical therapy as it turns out, was just because I went to the wrong place. After a shoulder surgery in May of 2016, I was referred to Chris and Corey from a friend and my outlook could not be more different now. Not only did they cater my shoulder rehab to my specific sport (weightlifting), they also helped me repair my hip and alleviate some of my pain. I’m a true believer in physical therapy now, even going as far as changing my career path so I can also change someone’s outlook. Chris and Corey go above and beyond for you and Lauren is always a friendly face when I come into the office. I can’t say enough good things. Thanks y’all!

resp.text: Thank you, thank you!  It was a pleasure working with you!
